content: The "No Known Allergies" concept is represented in AllergyIntolerance and the "No Known Problems" concept is represented in Condition. Would "No Active Medications" (or No Known Medications) be represented in MedicationRequest and/or MedicationStatement?
That should be represented as a MedicationUsage (MedicationStatement in R4).
do we have an example for how to do that?
no, but I would put the SNOMED code '787481004' No known medications in the MedicationUsage.medication.
The IPS Value Set... http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-ips/ValueSet-absent-or-unknown-medications-uv-ips.html that populates MedicationStatement.Medication
Thank you @Melva Peters and @Peter Jordan and others
Which status makes the most sense for this "No Known Medications" entry? Should it be active, not-taken, or unknown? http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/valueset-medication-statement-status.html

With R4, I would go with either 'active' even though the description of that code says "still taking the medication". NOTE: This is one of the reasons why we have changed MedicationUsage.status in R5.
To be fair, the semantics here are... not great ;-)
James Dinsmore has marked this topic as resolved.
